channel.title: Visit on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Visit on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Keanes Visit
item.description: Collected the troupes in Catado at the Repsol station in brilliant sunshine and Flo brought them home while I drove Blu back. {{ more }} Monday to my surprise we hit Valencia via the train from Bu√±ol. Our first stop was for chocolate in the Valor cafe where we planned the rest of the day. Next port of call was the Miguelette and the 207 narrow steps to the top, but it was well worth it for the views of Valencia.
